name: MHA/BNHA Otome Game
description:
My Hero Academia: Otome Game

(Prototype Version)

Ever wanted to play an otome game set in "My Hero Academia" world? Check out the prototype release of my little project! Download below ↓

  • MC's looks are (mostly) not specified + gender is neutral + name is changeable
  • Contains mild swearing (thanks, Bakugou)
  • 3 romance targets: Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki, Todoroki Shouto
  • Unlockable 'special' ending for each target
Developer's Note
  • Depending on the interest and my motivation, I do have plans to add on more stuff to this game, such as:
    • More game mechanics
    • More stories & scenarios added in
    • A day-to-day based visual novel system gameplay (think Persona series' gameplay)
    • More endings for each characters
    • (50:50, only if I have the patience) 'Voice' from the original VA.
  • Any comments / feedbacks / questions, you can direct them to my Tumblr!
Disclaimer
  • All assets included in the game are not mine, and credits to the asset owners / websites are included in the game, under "About" page!
  • This is a fangame project made just for fun and I don't intend to actively make money from it. If you want to show your support for what I do, you can instead buy me a coffee!
  • My Hero Academia / Boku no Hero Academia ⓒ Horikoshi Kouhei
